output: html_document
---

Initialize data: 

```{r}
library(GO.db)
totOffspring = as.list(GOBPOFFSPRING)
offspring = data.frame()
```

```{r}
FOI = list(
  tumorigenesis =
    c(
      "GO:0001525", #angiogenesis
      "GO:0016049", #cell growth
      "GO:0006915", #apoptotic process
      "GO:0008283", #cell population proliferation
      "GO:0016477" #cell migration
    ),
  immuneResponse = 
    c(
      "GO:0006955" #immune response
    ),
  cellTraficking =
    c(
      "GO:0099518" #vesicle cytoskeletal trafficking
    )
)

for(i in 1:length(FOI)) {
  foi = FOI[[i]]
  foiName = names(FOI)[i]
  print(foiName)
  for(j in 1:length(foi)) {
    foiTerm = foi[j]
    foiOffspring = totOffspring[[foiTerm]]
    df = data.frame(
      offspringTerm = foiOffspring, 
      fieldOfInterest = foiName, 
      BPname = Term(foiTerm)
    )
    offspring = rbind(offspring, df)
  }
}
```
